question_text: What is video output troubleshooting and what are the key things to verify?
answer_options: Only checking software video player applications and codecs
Verify signal generation from PC, cable integrity, monitor input selection, compatibility
Video output problems are exclusively network streaming issues
Only testing with high-resolution displays and gaming applications
correct_answer: Verify signal generation from PC, cable integrity, monitor input selection, compatibility
explanation: Video output troubleshooting verifies: 1) PC generates video signal (test with known good monitor), 2) Cable carries signal properly (test with different cable), 3) Monitor receives and displays signal (check input selection), 4) Resolution/refresh rate compatibility, 5) Proper video output selection (integrated vs dedicated graphics).
